body: @jbogard What about only a global AllowNullCollections?
There already is one, I've made MapperConfigurationExpression inherit from Profile. We might just not enforce it that way.

issue.title: Only a global AllowNullCollections
issue.body:
Closes #1618.
And if this makes sense, AllowNullDestinationValues too. Or just wait for someone to complain.

body: How would you propose one go about allowing null collections for all types in a specific Profile, if the property is removed?
Is there a status update on this issue?  I was able to set the global property, and this worked, but that is of course applied to all profiles.  For now, I have rolled back to 4.2.1.0.

issue.title: AllowNullCollections has no effect when a profile is used

body: Are there any updates here? @cjrogala's solution doesn't seem suitable in the long run.
Yeah, I'm working on a solution right now. Profiles are the last thing to get "fixed" from the configuration overhaul of 5.x

issue.title: Apply Root Configuration to Profiles
issue.body:
Currently, root configuration is separate from profiles. This includes:
- AllowNullCollections
- AllowNullDestinationValues
- ConstructorMapping
- ShouldMapField/Property
- CreateMissingTypeMaps
- Naming conventions
- Global ignores
- Extension methods
- Conventions

To fix this, we need to segregate the profile configuration entity from the runtime profile configuration. To do so, I'm creating a new class, ProfileMap, to be the analog to TypeMap and PropertyMap to represent the final configuration for a profile.

This also means that when we build a ProfileMap, I can examine the root configuration and anything set in your profile, to build the final picture. In order to do so, many of the defaults need to be removed in the Profile class, in addition to making some of the values nullable so that I can detect if they're set or not.

The final picture is a bit cleaner, with the ProfileMap class containing behavior of "how do I create a TypeMap", and the Profile class containing behavior of "how do I gather Profile configuration".

body: Great. When do you expect the changes to be available?
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
